name: Robo-Twins
description:
A game in which you control 2 robots, but not at the same time: when one is on, the other is off. A platformer with some minor puzzle mechanics made for the Nokia 3310 game jam 3. The bar on the left indicates when the commands move from one robot to the other. Time your moves right and leave the robot off in safe places or it may get hurt while you are unable to control it!

Controls:

-Move left/right = A-D or Left arrow/Right arrow

-Jump = W, Spacebar or Up arrow
